title: Icon Breakers and Life Makers: On Iconoclasm and the Feminine
description:
I sit down with YouTuber and writer @Benjamin A Boyce to discuss his understanding of Iconoclasm, (the breaking of Icons or sacred images), and the ways in which he incorporates the feminine into his writing. This was a fruitful discussion and I cannot stress enough the amount of untapped knowledge Benjamin possesses on matters of the sacred. This is one to watch guys.

Listen to the podcast version here: https://anchor.fm/podcast-9b57fe4/episodes/Icon-Breakers-and-Life-Makers-On-Iconoclasm-and-the-Feminine-edufqj
Benjamin's Youtube channel here: https://www.youtube.com/c/BenjaminABoyce

Follow him on twitter here: @BenjaminABoyce
Follow me on twitter here: @AndreaLynnLewis
